data.title: Poultrygeist: Night Of The Chicken Dead (3 DVD) (NTSC Region 1) – DiabolikDVD
data.text:
From Director Lloyd Kaufman, President of Troma Studios and the Creator of The Toxic Avenger comes Poultrygeist: Night of the Chicken Dead! When the American Chicken Bunker, a military themed fast food restaurant, builds its latest chain restaurant on the site of an ancient Native American burial ground, the displaced spirits take revenge on unsuspecting diners and transform them into chicken zombies! Now, it’s up to a dimwitted counterboy, his collegiate lesbian ex-girlfriend and a burqa-wearing fry cook to put an end to the foul feathered menace once and for all. A sly mix of social satire, extreme gore, slapstick comedy and toe-tapping musical numbers, Poultrygeist: Night of the Chicken Dead is the wildest and best-reviewed movie in Troma’s 35 Year History!

NTSC Region 1

3 DVD SE

Widescreen

90m Behind the Scenes Documentary

Introduction by Lloyd Kaufman

Deleted Scenes featuring Ron Jeremy

Kara-Yolk-E

SPecial FX lessions

Trailers and much more
